controls.title: Understand Organizational Context
controls.description: The organization identifies its cybersecurity and business context including stakeholders, obligations, and mission priorities.

controls.title: Establish Governance Structure
controls.description: A governance structure is established to oversee cybersecurity risk, assign authority, and ensure accountability.

controls.title: Risk Management Strategy
controls.description: The organization establishes a risk management strategy including risk appetite, tolerance, and evaluation methods.

controls.title: Asset Inventory
controls.description: Organizational assets including hardware, software, data, and external systems are inventoried.

controls.title: Conduct Risk Assessment
controls.description: Risk assessments are conducted to identify cybersecurity risks to operations and assets.

controls.title: Supply Chain Risk Management
controls.description: Supply chain risks are identified, monitored, and managed within the risk program.

controls.title: Access Control Policy
controls.description: Access control policies are implemented and reviewed to manage permissions and identities.

controls.title: Protect Data
controls.description: Data is protected through encryption, minimization, masking, and secure handling practices.

controls.title: Maintenance Processes
controls.description: Systems are maintained using approved tools, processes, and personnel.

controls.title: Monitor Security Events
controls.description: Security events are monitored, analyzed, and escalated as needed.

controls.title: Detect Anomalies and Events
controls.description: Anomalous activity is detected and analyzed to determine potential security incidents.

controls.title: Incident Response Planning
controls.description: Incident response plans are maintained, tested, and updated.

controls.title: Incident Communications
controls.description: Communication procedures are established for internal and external stakeholders during incidents.
